text: Gina Kirschenheiter laid into Vicki Gunvalson on Monday's episode of The Real Housewives Of Orange County. The'OG of the OC'had organized an'Italian night'so the women could'bond ', but it descended into shouting and tears. Vicki was irritated with Gina, a mother - of - three who was about to get a divorce from her husband Matt.
